title: Chicken Stir Fry
description: A delicious and quick chicken stir fry with vegetables
instructions: Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in a large pan or wok
Add chicken and cook until golden brown
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes
Add soy sauce and garlic
Serve hot over rice

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Cook pancetta in a large pan until crispy
Beat eggs with parmesan cheese and black pepper
Add cooked pasta to pancetta pan
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra parmesan

title: Vegetable Soup
description: Hearty vegetable soup perfect for cold days
instructions: Dice all vegetables into small pieces
Heat oil in a large pot
Add onions and cook until translucent
Add carrots, celery, and potatoes
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to boil
Add tomatoes and herbs
Simmer for 30 minutes until vegetables are tender

title: Beef Tacos
description: Flavorful beef tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large pan
Add taco seasoning and water
Simmer until sauce thickens
Warm taco shells in oven
Fill shells with beef mixture
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onion

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375Â°F
Cream butter and sugar together
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Mix in flour and baking soda
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden
